SLUMS.Definition: a very poor area of a city

ADDICTION.Definition: the need to take a harmful drug regularly, without being able to stop

PREMATURE.Definition: happening too soon, before its time

CARING.Definition: showing kindness and concern for others

NAUGHTY.Definition: a bit rude and not proper

LARGER-THAN-LIFE.Definition: someone who attracts special attention because he is very exciting

PITCH.Definition: an area painted with lines for playing football

OUTSKIRTS.Definition: areas at the edge of a city

SPOTTED.Definition: noticed, recognised as someone with talent

TALENT SCOUT.Definition: a person whose job is to search for talented players

DOMINATED.Definition: controlled (meaning that football was the most important thing in his life)

BREADWINNER.Definition: a person who earns money to support their family

BOYHOOD.Definition: the period when someone is a boy

WORKING CLASS.Definition: a social group of people who earn little money, usually by doing physical work

ATMOSPHERE.Definition: the tone or mood of a place

UNDERDOG.Definition: someone who has less power than the rest of society

ELITE.Definition: the richest, most powerful group in a society

RINGLEADER.Definition: a person who leads others in causing trouble

EMPLOYING.Definition: having someone to work for them and paying him

STREET-FIGHTER.Definition: a person who deals with others in an aggressive manner

TRANSFERRED.Definition: moved from one place to another one

LANGUISHED.Definition: were in an unpleasant situation for a long time

THE TABLE.Definition: the list of teams showing their position in the league

LOOK DOWN.Definition: think that they are better than

FANS.Definition: people who admire and support a person or a sport etc.

HOLDING BACK.Definition: stopping themselves from saying what they feel

RIVALS.Definition: people who are competing for the same thing

REMARKABLE.Definition: something special which is worth mentioning

CROWNED.Definition: given a title after winning a competition

ARROGANT.Definition: behaving as being more important than others

DEMI-GOD.Definition: a man who is greatly admired, treated almost as a god

GOALKEEPER.Definition: the player who guards the team's goal in order to stop the other team from scoring

SUMMARISED.Definition: showed briefly the most important facts

COUNTED.Definition: taken into account, been considered legit

SKILLFUL.Definition: someone who can do something well

PSEUDO-NEAPOLITAN.Definition: not really a Neapolitan, a false one

BOOED.Definition: made an expression of disapproval or disagreement

CURED.Definition: made healthy again, made something bad go away

GOADED.Definition: made someone do something by annoying them, provoked

HARDCORE.Definition: a small group of people with strong beliefs

NAIL IN THE COFFIN.Definition: something that will finally bring an end to something

RAGS TO RICHES.Definition: from being poor to being rich

BENEATH THE SURFACE.Definition: to look further than what is obvious

CLAN.Definition: a group of people with strong common interests

PROSTITUTION.Definition: the work of people who have sex for money

PROSTITUTE.Definition: someone who has sex with someone for money

PROSTITUTES.Definition: people who have sex with someone for money

INDEBTED.Definition: owing money or gratitude for a service

CHAUFFEUR.Definition: someone whose job is to drive a car for important people

STREET REPUTATION.Definition: fame among people in a local city environment

HANGING OUT.Definition: spending a lot of time with someone

VESTED INTEREST.Definition: a personal reason to do something because they would get an advantage from it

SAMPLES.Definition: small amount of something that shows what the rest of it should be like

DIVORCED.Definition: stopped being married because the marriage was legally ended

REHAB CLINICS.Definition: centres where people with an addiction are treated

LEGACY.Definition: something that exists as a result of things that happened before

ADDICT.Definition: someone who can't stop taking harmful drugs

SEXIST.Definition: someone who treats women unfairly, because of their sex

TAX EVADER.Definition: someone who tries to avoid taxes

SWALLOWED UP.Definition: taken in so that he could be used
